data.question: What is the publication year of the article discussing a new type of infinite 3D polymeric network?
What crystal system does the compound (Pd.py.porph).2Cd(N03)2.hydrate belong to?
Is the space group of the crystal C2/c?
What is the formula weight of (Pd.py.porph).2Cd(N03)2.xH20 for x=9.0?
Did the crystals of (Pd.py.porph).2Cd(N03)2.hydrate allow a satisfactorily low background for the measurement of reflections when sealed in Lindemann glass capillaries?
What technique was used to collect intensity data for the crystal?
Was anisotropic thermal parameters applied to all atoms in the crystal?
What was the final value of k at convergence during the refinement process?
How many lattice water molecules per asymmetric unit were indicated at convergence of the refinement?
Is the structure of (Pd.py.porph).2Cd(N03)2.hydrate centrosymmetric?
What was the method used to solve the structure of the crystal?
data.answer: A combination of Patterson map, direct methods and difference syntheses

data.question: Did the crystal structure determination involve corrections for Lorentz, polarization, and absorption effects?

What was the goodness of fit for the full-matrix least-squares refinement?
How many unique reflections were collected for the crystal structure determination?
Was the crystal glued to a very thin Lindemann glass fibre to minimize background scattering?
What was the crystal's color?
What was the calculated density (g cm^-3) of the crystal?
Did the extinction correction indicate significant extinction effects?
